      <span id="bc_guide_name">
       Marketing in Not-for-Profit Organizations

    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Marketing in Not-for-Profit Organizations &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Feb 9, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/nonprofitmktg
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">
      <span class="iprint">
       <a href="/print_content.php?pid=559368&amp;sid=4610684&amp;mode=g" title="View in a format suitable for printers and screen readers">
        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>
     </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16950910">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950910">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950910">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16950910">
          <p>
           Contact:
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly Communication Librarian
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Subject Specialist
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950910" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16950911">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950911">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950911">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Classification
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950911">
          <p>
           Three classification systems (taxonomies) of not-for-profits
          </p>
          <p>
           I. IRS Sub-Sections
          </p>
          <p>
           Here are the
           <a href="http://nccsdataweb.urban.org/PubApps/nonprofit-overview.php">
            three main types
           </a>
           of the IRS subsections. Here is a list of nonprofits by
           <a href="http://learn.guidestar.org/help/irs-subsection-codes">
            IRS subsection code
           </a>
           that are included in the NTEE classification system, explained further
           <a href="http://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-pdf/p557.pdf">
            here
           </a>
           .&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           II. NTEE Broad Categories and Major Groups
          </p>
          <p>
           The
           <a href="http://nccs.urban.org">
            National Center for Charitable Statistics
           </a>
           web site describes the National Taxonomy of Exempt Entities or NTEE, a classification for nonprofit organizations recognized as tax exempt under the Internal Revenue Code.
          </p>
          <p>
           Here is an
           <a href="http://nccs.urban.org/classification/NTEE.cfm">
            introduction
           </a>
           to the concept of NTEE classification, listing the 10 "broad categories" that make up this classification, and the 26 "major groups" that fall within these categories. For a summary listing of all codes, visit the
           <a href="http://nccsdataweb.urban.org/kbfiles/324/NTEE%20Two%20Page_2005.DOC">
            NTEE-CC Two Pager
           </a>
           . For a complete manual with in-depth description, examine the
           <a href="http://nccsdataweb.urban.org/kbfiles/322/NTEE-CC-Manual-2007a.pdf">
            NTEE-CC Manual
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           III. NAICS Industry Codes
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://nccsdataweb.urban.org/kbfiles/786/xwalka.pdf">
            NAICS
           </a>
           is another system used to categorize not-for-profits. It can be coordinated with NTEE Broad Categories, and also with the IRS via
           <a href="http://nccs.urban.org/classification/irsactivity.cfm">
            IRS Activity Codes
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950911" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16950912">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950912">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950912">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950912">
          <p>
           The
           <a href="http://nccs.urban.org">
            National Center for Charitable Statistics
           </a>
           web site is a great place to gather current statistics on total numbers of organizations by category. See especially the section: Data Analysis Tools &gt; "Table Wizard." Note the
           <a href="http://nccsdataweb.urban.org/PubApps/nonprofit-overview.php">
            distinction
           </a>
           made between private foundations and public charities.
          </p>
          <p>
           A wealth of statistics can also be found in the
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10619496">
            Nonprofit Almanac 2012
           </a>
           , available by library subscription. Selected data has been updated in the freely available
           <a href="http://www.urban.org/sites/default/files/alfresco/publication-pdfs/2000497-The-Nonprofit-Sector-in-Brief-2015-Public-Charities-Giving-and-Volunteering.pdf">
            2015 Nonprofit Sector in Brief
           </a>
           almanac.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950912" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16950913">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16950913">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16950913">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Directories
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16950913">
          <p>
           Domestic
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           Perhaps the single best directory of
           <i>
            U.S.
           </i>
           nonprofits on the web,
           <a href="http://www.guidestar.org/">
            GuideStar
           </a>
           (http://www.guidestar.org/) (password access only) offers basic directory information plus financial statements, mission and programs, goals and results, and leaders.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           For private foundations specifically, Guidestar can be used, but the
           <strong>
            <em>
             The Foundation Directory
            </em>
           </strong>
           , available on level A of the library, in Graduate Reference 061 F771d, is also useful.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           International
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           For
           <i>
            foreign
           </i>
           nonprofits, consult
           <a href="http://www.idealist.org/">
            idealist.org
           </a>
           . This directory is open access.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16950913" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4610684" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16951005">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951005">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951005">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951005">
          <p>
           Run a
           <a href="http://www.google.com">
            Google
           </a>
           search on your organization as well, for news about the organization and the organizational home page.
          </p>
          <p>
           For mention in newspapers, magazine, or trade publication, visit the library subscription database
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
            LexisNexis Academic
           </a>
           <a href="http://0-www.lexisnexis.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/us/lnacademic">
            ,
           </a>
           or
           <a class="text-muhlblue" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bsh" target="_blank">
            Business Source Complete
           </a>
           .
           <br />
           <br />
           For
           <em>
           </em>
           nonprofits in the Lehigh Valley, visit the library subscription database
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/morningcall/ip?accountid=40980">
            Morning Call via Proquest
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951005" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
